text:
Question 70) In order to minimize environmental impacts, Brazilian law states that chemical waste released directly into the receptor body have a pH between 5.0 and 9.0. An aqueous liquid residue generated in an industrial process has a concentration of hydroxyl ions equal to 1.0 × 10−10 mol/L. To comply with the legislation, a chemist separated the following substances, available in the company's warehouse: CH3COOH, Na2SO4, CH3OH, K2CO3 and NH4Cl.
So that the residue can be thrown directly into the receiving body, what substance could be used to adjust the pH?
A) CH3COOH
B) Na2SO4
C) CH3OH
D) k2co3
E) NH4Cl
